body.name: 14 Inches Twin Bed Frames, Heavy Duty Metal Platform Bed Frame with Mattress Slide Stopper - Easy Assembly | Noise Free Bedframes | No Box Spring Needed
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 15 hrs 8 mins
features: Premium Quality: Our platform twin size bed frame is constructed using sturdy materials, ensuring durability and long-lasting performance.
Hassle-free Assembly: With easy-to-follow instructions and all the necessary hardware included, the twin size bed frame can be easily assembled within minutes, saving you time and effort.
Noise Elimination: Designed with noise reduction in mind, our twin size bed frame features non-slip gaskets that prevent mattress movement and eliminate annoying squeaking sounds during the night.
Sleek and Modern Style: The simple yet stylish design of the bed frame adds a touch of elegance to any bedroom decor, making it a perfect choice for both modern and traditional interiors.

Customized Fit: The twin size bed frame has been specifically designed to accommodate a twin size mattress, with dimensions of 74.5"L x 38"W x 14"H, Suitable Mattress: 75" x 39", providing a snug and comfortable fit for a restful sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and affordable
reviews.reviewText: I love the fact that this bed offers great support. The rods are sturdy and very capable of holding those on the heavier side. It took me a while to put it together as there are LOTS of pieces and each piece is held in with screws. All parts and equipment for assembly are included and the instructions were clear on assembling. This frame is quite heavy. I appreciate the sturdiness and at such a great price too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to build
reviews.reviewText: The wood part of my bed frame broke. So I went to a furniture store to see how much it would cost to get a new one. They showed me a frame for 800! With lights and extra storage, I kept telling them I just needed a something simple. I left and went on Amazon to see what I could find and stumbled upon this bed frame. It was perfect a really good price, and metal to last me longer. It fit my full size mattress, it might be too tall for my dogs to jump on but that okay. I really do like this bed frame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together, a couple of screws were harder than others. Well made, had rubber on the bottom of the legs. Side pieces to hold the mattress are just plastic. it works but let's see how long they last

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I liked that it is all metal. I did not want wood slats so this was a great choice for me. It was simple to put together. It took about 40 minutes all together. I got rid of my box spring as the slats are close together to support my memory foam mattress (my mattress is also really tall so the box spring would have made my bed too high). The only thing that is an issue is that it is missing a rubber pad for one of the feet, but I put a piece of felt under it. I did not contact the company about this issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely a great buy
reviews.reviewText: This is so heavy duty and not hard to put together it look like a lot but definitely not.
